Class
Description
Category
Enum class for the different categories of expenses
CategoryTest
Tests for the Category class Just ensures that the categories are correct, it's not really needed but it's here for completeness and to practice TDD
Expense
Represents an expense claim made by an employee.
ExpensePrinter
Interface for printing expenses
ExpensesPortal
Manages a list of employee expenses.

Unit tests for the ExpensesPortal class.
ExpenseTest
 
InvalidExpenseAmount
Thrown when an expense is created with an invalid amount (negative or zero).
PrintByLabelTest
Unit tests for the PrinterByLabel class, which prints expenses grouped by category.
PrinterByLabel
Groups expenses by category and prints them in a structured format.
